local_intent: Detect and align to the grape, compute a pinch grasp pose, then verify the pose is available on the blackboard.
assumptions: ApproachAndAlign brings the end-effector into alignment suitable for computing a grasp
ComputeGraspPose publishes the computed pose under the key 'grasp_grape' upon success
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence around ComputeGraspPose: after perception and alignment, compute grasp for 'grape' and confirm pose availability.
